reviews.review_msg: Once in a while, it is good to take up a course that allows you to breathe. Straightforward course. Attendance is mandatory. Follow instructions and actively participate. Prof is helpful if you keep her in the loop. I forgot to turn in an assignment and I emailed her and met her personally about it, she accepted it after the deadline.

Easy course. Good grader. Min effort required. Courses like this are necessary to relieve stress from tough courses or sems. Seminar based course, so you'll self learn If you skip classes, she will screw your grades. My project mate and I did good final report & presentation; got similar midterm scores yet he got A and I got B as I was irregular

I find her lectures pretty easy to follow and the assignments are also pretty straight forward. I agree with a previous feedback, not everything will be spoon-fed to you, and you will have to do your share of work. Overall, the course requires some work from you end on a regular basis and you should be good.
